00040    Acknowledgement: The tracing mechanism is based on the tracing
00041    mechanism developed at Infineon (formerly Siemens HL). Though this
00042    code is somewhat different, and significantly enhanced, the basics
00043    are identical to what was originally contributed by Infineon.  The
00044    contribution of Infineon in the development of this tracing
00045    technology is hereby acknowledged.

00049 #ifndef SC_VCD_TRACE_H
00050 #define SC_VCD_TRACE_H
00051 
00052 #include "sysc/tracing/sc_trace_file_base.h"
00053 
00054 namespace sc_core {
00055 
00056 class sc_time;
00057 
00058 class vcd_trace;  // defined in sc_vcd_trace.cpp
00059 template<class T> class vcd_T_trace;
00060 
00061 
00062 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 //  CLASS : vcd_trace_file
00064 //
00065 //  ...
00066 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 
00068 class vcd_trace_file
00069   : public sc_trace_file_base
00070 {
00071 public:
00072 
00073     enum vcd_enum {VCD_WIRE=0, VCD_REAL, VCD_EVENT, VCD_TIME, VCD_LAST};
00074 
00075         // sc_set_vcd_time_unit is deprecated.
00076 #if 0 // deprecated
00077     inline void sc_set_vcd_time_unit(int exponent10_seconds)
00078         { set_time_unit(exponent10_seconds); }
00079 #endif
00080 
00081     // Create a Vcd trace file.
00082     // `Name' forms the base of the name to which `.vcd' is added.
00083     vcd_trace_file(const char *name);
00084 
00085     // Flush results and close file.
00086     ~vcd_trace_file();
00087 
00088 protected:
00089 
00090     // These are all virtual functions in sc_trace_file and
00091     // they need to be defined here.
00092 
00093     // Trace sc_time, sc_event
00094     virtual void trace(const sc_time& object, const std::string& name);
00095     virtual void trace(const sc_event& object, const std::string& name);
00096 
00097     // Trace a boolean object (single bit)
00098      void trace(const bool& object, const std::string& name);
00099 
00100     // Trace a sc_bit object (single bit)
00101     virtual void trace( const sc_dt::sc_bit& object,
00102             const std::string& name);
00103 
00104     // Trace a sc_logic object (single bit)
00105      void trace(const sc_dt::sc_logic& object, const std::string& name);
00106 
00107     // Trace an unsigned char with the given width
00108      void trace(const unsigned char& object, const std::string& name,
00109         int width);
00110 
00111     // Trace an unsigned short with the given width
00112      void trace(const unsigned short& object, const std::string& name,
00113         int width);
00114 
00115     // Trace an unsigned int with the given width
00116      void trace(const unsigned int& object, const std::string& name,
00117         int width);
00118 
00119     // Trace an unsigned long with the given width
00120      void trace(const unsigned long& object, const std::string& name,
00121         int width);
00122 
00123     // Trace a signed char with the given width
00124      void trace(const char& object, const std::string& name, int width);
00125 
00126     // Trace a signed short with the given width
00127      void trace(const short& object, const std::string& name, int width);
00128 
00129     // Trace a signed int with the given width
00130      void trace(const int& object, const std::string& name, int width);
00131 
00132     // Trace a signed long with the given width
00133      void trace(const long& object, const std::string& name, int width);
00134 
00135     // Trace an int64 with a given width
00136      void trace(const sc_dt::int64& object, const std::string& name,
00137          int width);
00138 
00139     // Trace a uint64 with a given width
00140      void trace(const sc_dt::uint64& object, const std::string& name,
00141          int width);
00142 
00143     // Trace a float
00144      void trace(const float& object, const std::string& name);
00145 
00146     // Trace a double
00147      void trace(const double& object, const std::string& name);
00148 
00149     // Trace sc_dt::sc_uint_base
00150      void trace (const sc_dt::sc_uint_base& object,
00151                 const std::string& name);
00152 
00153     // Trace sc_dt::sc_int_base
00154      void trace (const sc_dt::sc_int_base& object,
00155                 const std::string& name);
00156 
00157     // Trace sc_dt::sc_unsigned
00158      void trace (const sc_dt::sc_unsigned& object,
00159                 const std::string& name);
00160 
00161     // Trace sc_dt::sc_signed
00162      void trace (const sc_dt::sc_signed& object, const std::string& name);
00163 
00164     // Trace sc_dt::sc_fxval
00165     void trace( const sc_dt::sc_fxval& object, const std::string& name );
00166 
00167     // Trace sc_dt::sc_fxval_fast
00168     void trace( const sc_dt::sc_fxval_fast& object,
00169                 const std::string& name );
00170 
00171     // Trace sc_dt::sc_fxnum
00172     void trace( const sc_dt::sc_fxnum& object, const std::string& name );
00173 
00174     // Trace sc_dt::sc_fxnum_fast
00175     void trace( const sc_dt::sc_fxnum_fast& object,
00176                 const std::string& name );
00177 
00178     template<class T>
00179     void traceT(const T& object, const std::string& name,
00180         vcd_enum type=VCD_WIRE)
00181     {
00182         if( add_trace_check(name) )
00183             traces.push_back(new vcd_T_trace<T>( object, name
00184                                                , obtain_name(),type) );
00185     }
00186 
00187    // Trace sc_dt::sc_bv_base (sc_dt::sc_bv)
00188     virtual void trace(const sc_dt::sc_bv_base& object,
00189                 const std::string& name);
00190 
00191     // Trace sc_dt::sc_lv_base (sc_dt::sc_lv)
00192     virtual void trace(const sc_dt::sc_lv_base& object,
00193             const std::string& name);
00194 
00195     // Trace an enumerated object - where possible output the enumeration literals
00196     // in the trace file. Enum literals is a null terminated array of null
00197     // terminated char* literal strings.
00198      void trace(const unsigned& object, const std::string& name,
00199         const char** enum_literals);
00200 
00201     // Output a comment to the trace file
00202      void write_comment(const std::string& comment);
00203 
00204     // Write trace info for cycle.
00205      void cycle(bool delta_cycle);
00206 
00207 private:
00208 
00209     template<typename T> const T& extract_ref(const T& object) const
00210       { return object; }
00211     const sc_dt::uint64& extract_ref(const sc_event& object) const
00212       { return event_trigger_stamp(object); }
00213 
00214 #if SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00215     // avoid hidden overload warnings
00216     virtual void trace( sc_trace_file* ) const;
00217 #endif // SC_TRACING_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00218 
00219     // Initialize the VCD tracing
00220     virtual void do_initialize();
00221     void print_time_stamp(unit_type now_units_high, unit_type now_units_low) const;
00222     bool get_time_stamp(unit_type &now_units_high, unit_type &now_units_low) const;
00223 
00224     unsigned vcd_name_index;           // Number of variables traced
00225 
00226     unit_type previous_time_units_low;
00227     unit_type previous_time_units_high;
00228 
00229 public:
00230 
00231     // Array to store the variables traced
00232     std::vector<vcd_trace*> traces;
00233 
00234     // Create VCD names for each variable
00235     std::string obtain_name();
00236 
00237 };
00238 
00239 } // namespace sc_core
00240 
00241 #endif // SC_VCD_TRACE_H
